author: Shane Brinkman-Davis Delamore, Imikimi LLC
description: Simplified system of statuses for HTTP and any other network protocol
name: art-communication-status

scripts.build:
caf -m -c source -o build
npm run nn
scripts.build-clean:
# BUILD CLEAN START
#   - building into: build-temp
#
rm -rf ./__build-old__
caf -m -c source -o build-temp
npm run nn

nn build-temp/*

# BUILD CLEAN FINIALIZING
#  - replace old build in:   build
#  - with new build from:    build-temp
#
mv build __build-old__
mv build-temp build
rm -rf ./__build-old__
